Viral esophagitis, caused by herpes simplex virus (HSV) or cytomegalovirus, may also occur in immunocompromised patients. HSV esophagitis is treated with acyclovir, and cytomegalovirus is treated with ganciclovir (oral valganciclovir is also an option).
